text: if only it was that simple. I'm talking about approval workflows for the email product, not blogs.
Hey <@U01E3692GUF> do you mean hiding the default modules that HubSpot provides?

Yep, there must be an idea request somewhere for that we can upvote, although I can’t find it at the moment. Of course you can take away Publish permissions from some of your users, just leaving them with Write… but still, it’s not a approval/publish workflow
